dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA copyright infringement notice regarding boggsbaby.com]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 2004 4:07 PM
To: Legal Response
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA copyright infringement notice regarding
boggsbaby.com]

Forwarding to Legal for review.

-- 
Thanks,
Garrett White
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA copyright infringement notice regarding boggsbaby.com
Date: Tue, 14 Sep 2004 14:03:08 -0700
From: <staff@photopost.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC: legal@photopost.com

DOMAIN: BOGGSBABY.COM
IP:  67.18.253.84

To whom it may concern:

This is a formal complaint concerning a website on your network,
http://www.boggsbaby.com/inside/index.htm, which is using our PhotoPost
software without a license.  Our software source code is on file with the
United States Copyright and Trademark Office.

The only legitimate source of PhotoPost is http://www.photopost.com.

The information contained in this complaint is accurate, and as an
administrator of All Enthusiast, Inc., I am an authorized agent to act on
behalf of the copyright holder, which is the corporation itself.

We request that you immediately remove our software from your customer's
server.

Sincerely,
PhotoPost License Enforcement Division
All Enthusiast, Inc.

cc: Hal S. Shaftel, Esq.
Proskauer Rose, LLP
1585 Broadway
New York, NY 10036-8299
=======================
-----Original Message-----
From: Staff@PhotoPost [mailto:Staff@PhotoPost.com]
Sent: Tuesday, March 02, 2004 5:04 PM
To: rgraul@bellsouth.net
Subject: Your Installation of PhotoPost at boggsbaby.com

Hello,

It has come to our attention that you're operating an installation of
PhotoPost at http://www.boggsbaby.com

Use of our software is subject to the license agreement found at
http://www.photopost.com/phplicense.html.

Unfortunately we cannot locate a valid license for this installation.  If
you have a license for this installation, please reply with your license
number(s) and be sure to enter your domain name into the members area where
indicated.
http://www.photopost.com/manual/index.html

If you do not have a license for this installation, you must purchase
PhotoPost PHP Pro licenses, one for each domain name and installation
instance where PhotoPost is currently or has previously been installed, at
http://store.yahoo.com/techimo/photlic.html, within ten calendar days from
today.  Failing that, our attorneys will be in touch and your web host will
be instructed to remove our software from your webserver under the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act.

Regards,
PhotoPost License Enforcement
